alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 2:25PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson, southwestern Lewis and Oswego Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Oswego to near Fulton. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oswego, Fulton, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Stony Point, Pulaski, Central Square, Adams, Redfield, Selkirk Shores State Park, Mexico Point State Park, Adams Center, Nine Mile Point, Southwick Beach State Park, Battle Island State Park, Henderson Harbor, Hastings, Scriba, Volney, Richland and Constantia. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
